wikipedia_page.main: Roy William Stroud (15 March 1925 – 4 June 2015) was an English professional football inside right who played as an outside right for Hendon, West Ham United and Chelmsford City. He was capped by England at amateur level.

response: * 4 June 2015: Roy Stroud, 90, West Ham United forward.
